publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-164.1 Miss Annabel Goldie: Ferguson’s Shipyard, Port Glasgow—As an amendment to motion (S2M-164) in the name of Trish Godman, insert at end "and urges the Scottish Executive, in its role as procurer and potential procurer of vessels, to respond positively in respect of such bids". Supported by: Murdo Fraser*
S2M-164.1 Ferguson’s Shipyard, Port Glasgow (lodged on 20 June 2003) Mr David Davidson*
S2M-164.1 Ferguson’s Shipyard, Port Glasgow (lodged on 20 June 2003) John Scott*, Bill Aitken*
S2M-164.1 Ferguson’s Shipyard, Port Glasgow (lodged on 20 June 2003) Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-164.1 Ferguson’s Shipyard, Port Glasgow (lodged on 20 June 2003) Mrs Nanette Milne*
